verses.verse: Now Korach <WH7141>, the son <WH1121> of Izhar <WH3324>, the son <WH1121> of K'hat <WH6955>, the son <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, and Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>, the sons <WH1121> of Eliab <WH446>, and On <WH203>, the son <WH1121> of Peleth <WH6431>, sons <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205>, took <WH3947> <WH8799> men:

And they rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> before <WH6440> Mosheh <WH4872>, with certain <WH582> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> princes <WH5387> of the assembly <WH5712>, famous <WH7148> in the congregation <WH4150>, men <WH582> of renown <WH8034>:

And they gathered themselves together <WH6950> <WH8735> against Mosheh <WH4872> and against Aharon <WH175>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Ye take too much <WH7227> upon you, seeing all the congregation <WH5712> are holy <WH6918>, every one of them, and the YY <WH3068> is among <WH8432> them: wherefore then lift ye up <WH5375> <WH8691> yourselves above the congregation <WH6951> of the YY <WH3068> ?
And when Mosheh <WH4872> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> it, he fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon his face <WH6440>:

And he spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Korach <WH7141> and unto all his company <WH5712>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Havahn to morrow <WH1242> the YY <WH3068> will shew <WH3045> <WH8686> who are his, and who is holy <WH6918>; and will cause him to come near <WH7126> <WH8689> unto him: even him whom he hath chosen <WH977> <WH8799> will he cause to come near <WH7126> <WH8686> unto him.
This do <WH6213> <WH8798>; Take <WH3947> <WH8798> you censers <WH4289>, Korach <WH7141>, and all his company <WH5712>;

And put <WH5414> <WH8798> fire <WH784> therein <WH2004>, and put <WH7760> <WH8798> incense <WH7004> in them before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> to morrow <WH4279>: and it shall be that the man <WH376> whom the YY <WH3068> doth choose <WH977> <WH8799>, he shall be holy <WH6918>: ye take too much <WH7227> upon you, ye sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Korach <WH7141>, Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, I pray you, ye sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>:

Seemeth it but a small thing <WH4592> unto you, that the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> hath separated <WH914> <WH8689> you from the congregation <WH5712> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, to bring you near <WH7126> <WH8687> to himself to do <WH5647> <WH8800> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH4908> of the YY <WH3068>, and to stand <WH5975> <WH8800> before <WH6440> the congregation <WH5712> to minister <WH8334> <WH8763> unto them?
And he hath brought thee near <WH7126> <WH8686> to him, and all thy brethren <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> with thee: and seek <WH1245> <WH8765> ye the Kohenhood <WH3550> also?

For which cause <WH3651> both thou and all thy company <WH5712> are gathered together <WH3259> <WH8737> against the YY <WH3068>: and what is Aharon <WH175>, that ye murmur <WH3885> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH3885> <WH8735> against him?

And Mosheh <WH4872> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> to call <WH7121> <WH8800> Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>, the sons <WH1121> of Eliab <WH446>: which said <WH559> <WH8799>, We will not come up <WH5927> <WH8799>:

Is it a small thing <WH4592> that <WH3588> thou hast brought us up <WH5927> <WH8689> out of a land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, to kill <WH4191> <WH8687> us in the wilderness <WH4057>, except thou make <WH8323> thyself altogether <WH8323> <WH8692> a prince <WH8323> <WH8691> over us?

Moreover <WH637> thou hast not brought <WH935> <WH8689> us into a land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>, or given <WH5414> <WH8799> us inheritance <WH5159> of fields <WH7704> and vineyards <WH3754>: wilt thou put out <WH5365> <WH8762> the eyes <WH5869> of these men <WH582>? we will not come up <WH5927> <WH8799>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> was very <WH3966> wroth <WH2734> <WH8799>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, Respect <WH6437> <WH8799> not thou their offering <WH4503>: I have not taken <WH5375> <WH8804> one <WH259> ass <WH2543> from them, neither have I hurt <WH7489> <WH8689> one <WH259> of them.
And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Korach <WH7141>, Be thou and all thy company <WH5712> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, thou, and they, and Aharon <WH175>, to morrow <WH4279>:

And take <WH3947> <WH8798> every man <WH376> his censer <WH4289>, and put <WH5414> <WH8804> incense <WH7004> in them, and bring <WH7126> <WH8689> ye before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> every man <WH376> his censer <WH4289>, two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> censers <WH4289>; thou also, and Aharon <WH175>, each <WH376> of you his censer <WH4289>.

And they took <WH3947> <WH8799> every man <WH376> his censer <WH4289>, and put <WH5414> <WH8799> fire <WH784> in them, and laid <WH7760> <WH8799> incense <WH7004> thereon, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> in the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> with Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>.

And Korach <WH7141> gathered <WH6950> <WH8686> all the congregation <WH5712> against them unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>: and the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto all the congregation <WH5712>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872> and unto Aharon <WH175>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Separate <WH914> <WH8734> yourselves from among <WH8432> this congregation <WH5712>, that I may consume <WH3615> <WH8762> them in a moment <WH7281>.

And they fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon their faces <WH6440>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O 'Elohim <WH410>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of the spirits <WH7307> of all flesh <WH1320>, shall one <WH259> man <WH376> sin <WH2398> <WH8799>, and wilt thou be wroth <WH7107> <WH8799> with all the congregation <WH5712> ?
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto the congregation <WH5712>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Get you up <WH5927> <WH8734> from about <WH5439> the tabernacle <WH4908> of Korach <WH7141>, Dathan <WH1885>, and Abiram <WH48>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> and went <WH3212> <WH8799> unto Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>; and the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> followed <WH3212> <WH8799> him <WH310>.

And he spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the congregation <WH5712>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Depart <WH5493> <WH8798>, I pray you, from the tents <WH168> of these wicked <WH7563> men <WH582>, and touch <WH5060> <WH8799> nothing of theirs, lest ye be consumed <WH5595> <WH8735> in all their sins <WH2403>.

So they gat up <WH5927> <WH8735> from the tabernacle <WH4908> of Korach <WH7141>, Dathan <WH1885>, and Abiram <WH48>, on every side <WH5439>: and Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48> came out <WH3318> <WH8804>, and stood <WH5324> <WH8737> in the door <WH6607> of their tents <WH168>, and their wives <WH802>, and their sons <WH1121>, and their little children <WH2945>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Hereby ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8799> that the YY <WH3068> hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all these works <WH4639>; for I have not done them of mine own mind <WH3820>.

If these men die <WH4191> <WH8799> the common death <WH4194> of all men <WH120>, or if they be visited <WH6485> <WH8735> after the visitation <WH6486> of all men <WH120>; then the YY <WH3068> hath not sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me.

But if the YY <WH3068> make <WH1254> <WH8799> a new thing <WH1278>, and the earth <WH127> open <WH6475> <WH8804> her mouth <WH6310>, and swallow them up <WH1104> <WH8804>, with all that appertain unto them, and they go down <WH3381> <WH8804> quick <WH2416> into the pit <WH7585>; then ye shall understand <WH3045> <WH8804> that these men <WH582> have provoked <WH5006> <WH8765> the YY <WH3068>.
And it came to pass, as he had made an end <WH3615> <WH8763> of speaking <WH1696> <WH8763> all these words <WH1697>, that the ground <WH127> clave asunder <WH1234> <WH8735> that was under them:

And the earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> <WH8799> her mouth <WH6310>, and swallowed them up <WH1104> <WH8799>, and their houses <WH1004>, and all the men <WH120> that appertained unto Korach <WH7141>, and all their goods <WH7399>.

They, and all that appertained to them, went down <WH3381> <WH8799> alive <WH2416> into the pit <WH7585>, and the earth <WH776> closed <WH3680> <WH8762> upon them: and they perished <WH6> <WH8799> from among <WH8432> the congregation <WH6951>.

And all Yisra'EL <WH3478> that were round about <WH5439> them fled <WH5127> <WH8804> at the cry <WH6963> of them: for they said <WH559> <WH8804>, Lest the earth <WH776> swallow us up <WH1104> <WH8799> also.

And there came out <WH3318> <WH8804> a fire <WH784> from the YY <WH3068>, and consumed <WH398> <WH8799> the two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> men <WH376> that offered <WH7126> <WH8688> incense <WH7004>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH559> <WH8798> unto Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> the Kohen <WH3548>, that he take up <WH7311> <WH8686> the censers <WH4289> out <WH996> of the burning <WH8316>, and scatter <WH2219> <WH8798> thou the fire <WH784> yonder <WH1973>; for they are hallowed <WH6942> <WH8804>.

The censers <WH4289> of these sinners <WH2400> against their own souls <WH5315>, let them make <WH6213> <WH8804> them broad <WH7555> plates <WH6341> for a covering <WH6826> of the altar <WH4196>: for they offered <WH7126> <WH8689> them before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, therefore they are hallowed <WH6942> <WH8799>: and they shall be a sign <WH226> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the brasen <WH5178> censers <WH4289>, wherewith they that were burnt <WH8313> <WH8803> had offered <WH7126> <WH8689>; and they were made broad <WH7554> <WH8762> plates for a covering <WH6826> of the altar <WH4196>:

To be a memorial <WH2146> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that <WH834> <WH4616> no stranger <WH376> <WH2114> <WH8801>, which is not of the seed <WH2233> of Aharon <WH175>, come near <WH7126> <WH8799> to offer <WH6999> <WH8687> incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>; that he be not as Korach <WH7141>, and as his company <WH5712>: as the YY <WH3068> said <WH1696> <WH8765> to him by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872>.

But on the morrow <WH4283> all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> murmured <WH3885> <WH8735> against Mosheh <WH4872> and against Aharon <WH175>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Ye have killed <WH4191> <WH8689> the people <WH5971> of the YY <WH3068>.

And it came to pass, when the congregation <WH5712> was gathered <WH6950> <WH8736> against Mosheh <WH4872> and against Aharon <WH175>, that they looked <WH6437> <WH8799> toward the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>: and, behold, the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> <WH8765> it, and the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> came <WH935> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Get you up <WH7426> <WH8734> from among <WH8432> this congregation <WH5712>, that I may consume <WH3615> <WH8762> them as in a moment <WH7281>. And they fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon their faces <WH6440>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Aharon <WH175>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> a censer <WH4289>, and put <WH5414> <WH8798> fire <WH784> therein from off <WH6440> the altar <WH4196>, and put <WH7760> <WH8798> on incense <WH7004>, and go <WH3212> <WH8685> quickly <WH4120> unto the congregation <WH5712>, and make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8761> for them: for there is wrath <WH7110> gone out <WH3318> <WH8804> from the YY <WH3068>; the plague <WH5063> is begun <WH2490> <WH8689>.

And Aharon <WH175> took <WH3947> <WH8799> as Mosheh <WH4872> commanded <WH1696> <WH8765>, and ran <WH7323> <WH8799> into the midst <WH8432> of the congregation <WH6951>; and, behold, the plague <WH5063> was begun <WH2490> <WH8689> among the people <WH5971>: and he put <WH5414> <WH8799> on incense <WH7004>, and made an atonement <WH3722> <WH8762> for the people <WH5971>.
And he stood <WH5975> <WH8799> between the dead <WH4191> <WH8801> and the living <WH2416>; and the plague <WH4046> was stayed <WH6113> <WH8735>.

Now they that died <WH4191> <WH8801> in the plague <WH4046> were fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967>, beside them that died <WH4191> <WH8801> about the matter <WH1697> of Korach <WH7141>.
And Aharon <WH175> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872> unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>: and the plague <WH4046> was stayed <WH6113> <WH8738>.
